House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05136
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A SYSTEM OF ACCREDITATION FOR GARBAGE COLLECTION SERVICE BUSINESS, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to mandate the Environmental Management Bureau to establish and operationalize a system of accreditation for owners, contractors, and/or operators of garbage collection or hauling service businesses for a more systematized and efficient implementation of RA9003 - the Ecological Solid Waste Management Act of 2000.
